name: Observer Pattern
description: Implement an observer pattern simulation. Given events as [type, data] where type is 'subscribe' (observer_id), 'unsubscribe' (observer_id), or 'notify' (value), return an array of all notifications received by all active observers. Each notification adds [observer_id, value] to results.
hints: Maintain a set of active observers. On 'notify', iterate through all observers and record notifications. On 'subscribe'/'unsubscribe', update the observer set.
